tagline: A mod for Minetest which adds snow.
body:
![snow](http://img836.imageshack.us/img836/8527/screenshot2780125400.png)
This mod adds snow biomes to minetest.
There are nine biome types: (click on one to see the image)
* [Normal](http://img20.imageshack.us/img20/402/cold3.png)
* [Icebergs](http://img193.imageshack.us/img193/5245/icebergs.png)
* [Icesheet](http://img526.imageshack.us/img526/2755/icesheet.png)
* [Broken Icesheet](http://img337.imageshack.us/img337/6816/icehole.png)
* [Icecave](http://img688.imageshack.us/img688/2592/icecaver.png)
* [Coast](http://img833.imageshack.us/img833/6908/cold2.png)
* [Alpine](http://img705.imageshack.us/img705/5660/screenshot3178948531.png)
* [Snowy](http://img836.imageshack.us/img836/9190/screenshot3123824172.png)
* [Plain](http://img541.imageshack.us/img541/4341/screenshot3123507278.png)

Example map:

![Map](http://img802.imageshack.us/img802/3824/mapabu.png)

**Features:**
* You can craft snow blocks with four snowballs.
* You can craft snow bricks with four snow blocks.
* Snow and ice melts when near warm blocks such as lava, torches etc.
* Water freezes over when snow blocks are in contact.
* 3d snow made possible with nodebox technology!
* Moss spreads on cobble to make mossy cobble.
* Christmas trees can be found when digging pine needles.
